QuestName: Free Their Minds, the Rest Will Follow

Tag_Imageneed.description: ''[[The Fate of Atlantis | Assassin's Creed: Odyssey — The Fate of Atlantis]]''

MemoryInfobox.description: 'While Kassandra learned her Staff of Hermes Trismegistus|Staff could release human minds from Persephone's control, she traveled across Elysium to set them free. Once liberated, they would join forces to fight with Adonis's rebellion against their queen.'
MemoryInfobox.appearance: 'Assassin's Creed: Odyssey' – 'The Fate of Atlantis: Fields of Elysium'

General_Description: ''' Free Their Minds, the Rest Will Follow''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Outcome: Kassandra freed eight mind-controlled soldiers in [[Minos' Faith]], [[Pheraia's Retreat]] and [[Deukalion's Heritage]].
Section_Trivia:
*Completing "[[The Rebellion's Uprising]]" will cancel this memory, preventing it from being completed.
*This memory will need to be completed for the [[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey achievements|Achievement/trophy]] ''The Conqueror''.
*The name of the memory is a reference to the song ''{{Wiki|Free Your Mind (song)|Free Your Mind}}'' by {{Wiki|En Vogue}}.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]'' – ''[[The Fate of Atlantis: Fields of Elysium]]''
